timeline.message:
plugin.yml - update line endings
- This was missed in the major update, and is causing issues for some
Merge branch 'dev-2.5' of https://github.com/SkriptLang/Skript into dev-2.5
DefaultComparators - fix slot comparisons between inventory slot and equiptment slot

timeline.author: APickledWalrus

replies.bodyText: kinda just does the same thing with more lines.
replies.author: ShaneBeee

replies.bodyText: Maybe - I mainly suggested this just to avoid the double instanceof checks. Not that it really has that much of an impact though
replies.author: APickledWalrus

replies.bodyText: in all fairness your suggestion is a double instance check anyways
replies.author: ShaneBeee
